title: Breakingviews TV: Better bankers
text:
Breakingviews TV: Better bankers Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 61:30 
New York Fed President Bill Dudley discusses ways to improve the culture of the financial industry with CIT CEO Ellen Alemany and former Citi executive Bill Rhodes. Hint: there's work to be done on better aligning compensation and values, and creating stronger boards. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
New York Fed President Bill Dudley discusses ways to improve the culture of the financial industry with CIT CEO Ellen Alemany and former Citi executive Bill Rhodes. Hint: there's work to be done on better aligning compensation and values, and creating stronger boards.
